name: P-arrrrr-ty Games
description:
Arrrrr welcome lads and lasses. I hope ye' are ready for a dirty battle for me treasure. This eer' tavern has been needing some action for years. Go put on a show ye' scallywags.

Controls:

Player 1-

Movement: W,A,S,D

Action button: Tab

Reload weapon: Q

Player 2-

Movement: Arrow Keys

Action button: Enter

Reload weapon: PgDn

FYI:

This project was initially planned to consist of 5 mini games. However we left it with 4 and wanted to share what we managed to complete.
